    • Method Detail

      • CanBeLoad

        public boolean CanBeLoad()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method can validate all pre-requisites are allowed to load SophiaBCrypt without errors 1 - Sets the parameter filename 2 - Check the existing of the parameter file; 3 - Check the existing of the language parameter on parameter file;
        Returns:
        isAllowed True if application to be run
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Case File parameter don't be created
        Since:
        October/2018
